title: Who was Saif al-Islam Gaddafi? Son of late Libya dictator Moammar Gaddafi killed in his home
summary_full: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, once seen as Libya's Western-friendly reformer and heir apparent, has been killed in a direct confrontation after gunmen stormed his home.  He played a key role in his father's regime, later becoming a divisive figure during the 2011 uprising.  After years of detention and a death sentence, he resurfaced seeking the presidency, a bid that ultimately failed.
